org.atmosphere.vibe.transport.ws

Class WebSocketServerTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.vibe.transport.BaseServerTransport
      • org.atmosphere.vibe.transport.ws.WebSocketServerTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerTransport

    public class WebSocketServerTransport
extends BaseServerTransport
    Represents a server-side WebSocket transport.

    Because WebSocket protocol itself meets Transport's requirements, WebSocketServerTransport is actually a thread-safe version of ServerWebSocket.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
